name: Happy Pingu
description:
The Happy Pinguin is on a quest for fish to feed his family. Make your way through multiple levels in this platformer and try can beat you best highscore. This project started out as my first unity project to learn the basics. But as I am working on it, it turnd more into a game instead of a coding exerice. Don't expect too much and just enjoy the slide. Current roadmap:
  • More levels
  • Online leaderboard
  • Redo touch support to make it playable on mobile

Credits:
